title: Di Gi Charat Natsuyasumi Special
synopsis: The Di Gi Charat Natsuyasumi Special was another four episode series set in America that aired almost a year after the original series from August 2, 2001 to August 3, 2001. The young American otaku, Rodoyan, is introduced in this series.
characters: ['Di Gi Charat', 'Petit Charat', 'Usada, Hikaru', 'Gema', 'Rodoyan', 'Analogue III, Pyocola', 'Abarenbou', 'Schweitzer, Ky', 'Erhard, Coo', 'Kimura, Takuro']
staff: [['Sakurai, Hiroaki', ['Director']], ['Takahashi, Tooru', ['Director']], ['Sawashiro, Miyuki', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Okui, Masami', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
